comparisons.text: Fibreglass batts + building wrap require 4 separate products and still allow air infiltration. YetiFoam creates a seamless single-product air barrier.
Anti-con blanket provides <5% radiant heat reduction; YetiFoam eliminates radiant heat impact under metal roofs.
Batts + wrap fail to prevent condensation on metal surfaces. YetiFoam's continuous layer eliminates moisture risks.
Foilboard ignores thermal bridging; YetiFoam restores efficiency by covering all bridges.
Fasteners and bridging reduce effective insulation. YetiFoam covers bridges to maintain efficiency.
Batts add no structural benefit; YetiFoam increases wall resistance and roof uplift.
Anti-con breaks down with leaks; YetiFoam shows 25-year leak-free performance.
Foilboard offers partial coverage and negligible wind resistance; YetiFoam delivers uplift boost with full coverage.
Batts leave gaps; YetiFoam adheres completely to prevent thermal shock and degradation.
Alternatives 'manage' condensation with multiple products; YetiFoam eliminates it with one system.
Manufacturers of batts rarely install, creating deniability; YetiFoam delivers lifetime performance.
Batts offer negligible benefit under metal roofs; YetiFoam removes external temperature impact.
